meanings.sent1: She hoidened her clothes while playing in the mud.
meanings.sent2: The children hoidened the room with their toys scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The puppy hoidened the yard by digging up all the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The storm hoidened the streets with fallen leaves and debris.
meanings.sent5: The artist hoidened the canvas with splashes of paint in a chaotic yet artistic way.

meanings.definition: To behave in a disorderly or rowdy manner.
meanings.sent1: The fans hoidened during the exciting football match.
meanings.sent2: The students hoidened in the cafeteria during lunch break.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys hoidened around, swinging from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: The party hoidened up as the music got louder and people danced wildly.
meanings.sent5: The protesters hoidened their chants, demanding change with passion.
